column4: is there really any performance increase or benefit from using the 64 bit vs. 32 bit
ok.. cause in 32 bit ubuntu my .wmv files work fine but the 64 bit i have no audio so i'm thinking of switching my main comp back to 32 bit
is there anyway to get the 32 bit to use all of my 4gb of ram?
it does.. just like windows there is some overhead taken..  this is a 32 bit problem or occurance and not specific to ubuntu
